    • Field Detail

      • ENABLE_SOFTWARE_STREAM_DECK

        public static boolean ENABLE_SOFTWARE_STREAM_DECK
        Flag for enabling the software stream deck GUI. true Stream Deck devices will be wrapped in a software SD, false the StreamDeck will be returned directly.

      • logger

        private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger
